single.title: Report Period
single.searchString: `ct_config_index` `ct_report_period` sourcetype=stash search_name="Config_Tracker: *" | stats max(_time) as last_seen min(_time) as first_seen | eval first_seen = strftime(first_seen, "%m/%d/%Y") | eval last_seen = strftime(last_seen, "%m/%d/%Y") | eval date = first_seen. " - " .last_seen | fields date

table.title: Apps
table.searchString: `ct_config_index` `ct_report_period` sourcetype=stash search_name="Config_Tracker: apps" | stats count as days_seen max(_time) as last_seen min(_time) as first_seen by host `ct_fields_apps` | `ct_change_state` | where state!="No Change" | search NOT `ct_whitelisted_dates` | `ct_display_change_no_app`

table.title: Deployment Server Serverclass
table.searchString: `ct_config_index` `ct_report_period` sourcetype=stash search_name="Config_Tracker: serverclass" | stats count as days_seen max(_time) as last_seen min(_time) as first_seen by host `ct_fields_serverclass`| `ct_change_state` | where state!="No Change" | search NOT `ct_whitelisted_dates` | `ct_display_change_no_app`
